name: Silver Millenium
startIntroPart1: She would almost never leave the Crystal Palace but one day in a panic she left suddenly. Then a huge explosion occurred and everything was blown away in an instant except for the Crystal Palace, which was made from the Silver Crystal. Afterwards there was a grave silence at that very moment the Queens body was instantly engulfed in crystal as if she was being protected. However the four Senshi, Sailor Mars, Sailor Venus, Sailor Mercury and Sailor Jupiter along with King Endymion who were at her side, took a direct hit and fell. Chibiusa and Diana were the only ones who were spared.
startIntroPart2: Oh, Neo-Queen Serenity... Would you be able to save silver Millenium... Will you stay frozen in a crystal and watch as your empire shattered like a broken glass... Will you stand the test of time.
declaringWar: Resistance is futile! Prepare to be assimilated!
attacked: You want to play? Very funny!
defeated: How is it possible that those Apes hurt us? The galactic senate will take care of them.
introduction: As superior galactic entities, you are not worthy of our attention.
hateNo: We are not agreeing to that!
afterPeace: Very well, all that fighting was getting boring anyway.
tradeRequest: We bestow you the honor of this trade offer.
uniques: City-State Influence recovers at twice the normal rate
